snippet.title: Marathon & Long Distance Running Tips - PART 1
snippet.description: It's taken me years of trial and error, MASS research and inquiries...

snippet.title: Get the Most out of Your Nexus 5
snippet.description: CNET's Dan Graziano shares with you tips and tricks for Google's latest flagship smartphone.

snippet.title: LAN Party: DayZ Standalone -- Day Three
snippet.description: It's our latest attempt to survive in the post-apocalyptic kill-or-be-killed world of DayZ.

snippet.title: Everything Wrong with RoboCop in 7 Minutes
snippet.description: Well... either we've heard your cries for the past three weeks, or else we looked at the Hollywood schedule and saw a RoboCop remake coming up soon. Either way, we had a blast looking for all the sins we could find.

snippet.title: Epic Meal Time: Snack Stadium
snippet.description: Epic Meal Time took over the Bud Light Hotel for the Super Bowl, and built a Snack Stadium! This is over 275,000 calories of snacks brought to you by the Steven Seagals of the cooking game!

snippet.title: Ronnie's Rib Sandwich - Handle It
snippet.description: Watch Prince Atari (AKA Cohaagen Murdervitch) teach you how to make a black market McRib.
